description: sign +‎ off, from the phrasal verb.

entries.meaning: The act or process of signing off (approving with a signature).
The process of exiting a computer system; logoff.
examples: Another problem stems from the fact that many different things can cause a user signoff. ln most cases, it is the issuance of the $SIGNOFF command, but there are other circumstances after which the system will force a user off  […]

entries.meaning: (bridge) A bid indicating that one's partner should pass.
